ABOUT ME

About Me

Tell me about yourself...

I’m Ashley Canty, a passionate, self taught iOS Developer from New Jersey. I graduated from Rutgers-Newark with a B.S. in Computer Science. I mainly rely on Swift and have dabbled in Objective-C. For backend, I’ve only used Firebase but I’m open to other alternatives. Some other languages that I have used in the past are Java, C, and Python, which were mostly through academic projects.

What are your main tools?

Any time I step into the arena of development, I of course need my MacBook. But most importantly, these are the three essentials I must alway carry with me: my passion for expression(creativity), my skill-set, and my willingness to learn.

Do you have other skills?

I’m also familiar with HTML, CSS, and Javascript. Prior to iOS Development, I used to study web development. In fact, once I decided I wanted a portfolio website without the limitations that a template can bring, I decided to brush up on my web dev skills. I built this website using NodeJs and Sass.
